attributes.action: Prevent radicalised fighters from returning from Syria.
attributes.additional_details: It is impossible for the security services to prevent lone wolf attacks, particularly those using vehicles or other low-tech 'weapons'.  The only real way to increase security is to lower the number of people that present a threat.
attributes.background: It appears that the UK is willing to let hundreds of radicalised ex-ISIS fighters into the country. This must be prevented by changing or challenging international law if necessary.
